title: Petersen House (Sweden)
text:
Petersen House (Sweden)

The Petersen House (Swedish: Petersenska huset) is a building in Stockholm, Sweden, erected between 1645 and 1659 from construction drawings by Christian Julius Döteber, and built in the Dutch Baroque architectural style.
summary: The Petersen House is a building in Stockholm, Sweden, erected between 1645 and 1659 from construction drawings by Christian Julius Döteber, and built in the Dutch Baroque architectural style.
